actions.committee: House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: A bill to authorize an allowance based on living costs and conditions of environment for judicial employees employed outside the continental United States or in Alaska.

summary.text: Provides a cost of living allowance for court employees and officials employed outside the continental United States or in Alaska. Limits such allowance to 25 percent of the employee's base salary.

titles.title: A bill to authorize an allowance based on living costs and conditions of environment for judicial employees employed outside the continental United States or in Alaska.
